assignments.name: Assign_POS_Solution_Obj_To_Collection
assignments.label: Assign POS Solution Obj To Collection

fields.name: Card_Options_Title
fields.fieldText: For Payments Solutions Please Select Card Options:

fields.name: Acquirer_Required
fields.fieldText: PA, PC and PA 3rd Party Solutions with Payments must have a related Acquirer.

fields.name: Acquiring_Bank
fields.helpText: PA, PC and PA 3rd Party Solutions with Payments must have a related Acquirer.

fields.name: Contact_Required
fields.fieldText: You must have a contact associated to PI, PII, POL and PT solution types.

fields.name: Till_System_Required
fields.fieldText: For PI Solutions please complete the Till System field.

fields.name: Terminal_ID_Header
fields.fieldText: Enter the Terminal ID for POS Solution {!CurrentPOSSolution} of {!Number_of_POS_Solutions}

fields.name: No_POS_Solutions_Entered_Message
fields.fieldText: Click 'Previous' and enter a number of POS Solution that is greater than 0.
